payload.title: Unified Git/GitHub Agent
payload.description:
Create intelligent Git/GitHub agent that unifies commit_conventions.md and github_workflows.md into a single operational prompt.

OBJECTIVES:
1. Unified prompt smarter than ChatGPT5 (less rigid, more contextual)
2. Native GitGovernance workflow integration (draft→review→ready→active→done)
3. Hook system for other agents to trigger Git operations
4. Intelligent automation of commits, branches and PRs
5. Complete traceability between code and tasks

DELIVERABLES:
- ✅ Unified prompt in docs/unified_git_agent_prompt.md
- ⏳ Implementation as Cursor/CLI agent
- ⏳ Hook API for other agents
- ⏳ Testing with real use cases

VALUE:
- Eliminates friction of searching between 2 files
- Automates complete Git/GitHub workflow
- Enables multi-agent collaboration
- Maintains GitGovernance standards
